headline: CISO Leader David Hahn Joins DTEX’s Advisory Board
summary: Trusted cybersecurity advisor will bring his expertise to the company’s insider-risk missionSAN JOSE, Calif., Sept. 09, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- DTEX, the trusted leader in insider risk management, today announced the appointment of David Hahn to its Advisory Board. With decades of experience building cybersecurity programs across industries, Hahn brings his expertise to DTEX during a critical period, as growing AI-powered threats and geopolitical tensions raise the stakes for every organization

headline: Intuit's AI Push Boosts Growth: Can TurboTax and QuickBooks Lead?
summary: INTU posts $18.8B in revenues as AI powers growth across TurboTax, QuickBooks, Credit Karma and Mailchimp.
